channel.title: Frost and dry tolerant plants and perenials
channel.description: Frost and dry tolerant plants and perenials

item.title: Perennialle Plants Nursery
item.description:
Perennialle Plants Nursery

Perennialle Plants is a mail order nursery specialising in drought hardy and low water use perennials and other plants for the cottage garden, perennial border, rockery and Mediterranean garden all expertly grown in their nursery. They can help you create a beautiful garden with rare, hard to find frost and drought tolerant perennials, shrubs and other garden plants.

item.title: Gardening: hardy and handsome, perennials are always a plus
item.description:
Gardening: hardy and handsome, perennials are always a plus

Entertainment Salvia leucantha from Perennialle Plants. Photo: Robin Powell Chris Cuddy describes himself as a plant nerd. What does that mean? Here's an example: his favourite plant is an ancient survivor of the Namibian and Angolan deserts, Welwitschia mirabilis. This Jurassic-era plant produces only two leaves during its life and can live 1500 years.

item.title: Meet Chris Cuddy, Perennial enthusiast and owner of Perennialle Plants, Canowindra. | Latest News | Collectors' Plant Fair
item.description:
Meet Chris Cuddy, Perennial enthusiast and owner of Perennialle Plants, Canowindra. | Latest News | Collectors' Plant Fair

Perenialle Plants is a mail-order nursery for tough plants, but you can also drop in. Don't miss the chance if you are in the Canowindra area. As well as the plants, there's an inspiring garden and lovely little shop full of artisan-made house and garden desirables.
